post:
This is being launched here first, more of a general announcement before the email goes out in a bit but I wanted to put it here first :)

---

Coupon Code: FRAPHX33

Works on all plans with 1GB Ram or more in Frankfurt or Phoenix.

Frankfurt Plans: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=34

Phoenix Plans: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=35

---

Cheapest (with discount):

2 CPU Core (Equal Share E-2276G or similar)
1 GB Ram DDR4
20 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space (Enterprize grade)
3000 GB Bandwidth @ 10 Gbit (shared)
1 x IPv4 address
1 x /64 IPv6

€1.68 /month

Most expensive: (With Discount)

2 CPU Core (Equal Share E-2276G or similar))
8 GB Ram DDR4
100 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space (Enterprize grade)
24000 GB Bandwidth @ 10 Gbit (shared)
1 x IPv4 address
1 x /64 IPv6

€13.40 /month

---

All plans come with FREE complimentary DDOS protection and are eligible for FREE direct admin standard licenses on request.

---

Speed tests: https://as62240.net/speedtest
Network Diagnostics: https://as62240.net/tools

The new Pheonix Plans are on Clouviders network, they have IPv6 :) 

Any questions are welcome :)

Cheers.

Ant.
